name: Still Life the Vanities of Human Game

metadata.name: Still Life with Video Game  #01
metadata.description:
Zennyan is Tokyo Based Pixel Artist.
He works across art, design, game entertainment and territory.

The main motif of Still Life: the Vanities of Human Game collection will a retro PC or a cathode ray tube and flowers.

He expresses the PC as realistically as possible, and gradually emphasize the dots around the motifs to make the game world pop out.

Pixel art is a technique used on older PCs.
By drawing a PC using it, it gives the impression that reality and fiction are reversed. he wanted to give the viewer a feeling that there is no distinction between reality and fiction.

1080 X 1080
